constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 146 (Friday, August 13, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. VAN DREW:
H.R. 5036.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8
[Page H4331]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on the Constitution, Civil Rights, and Civil Liberties.

title: To amend titles 36 and 38, United States Code, to direct the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to carry out actions for certain surviving family members of veterans deceased as the result of suicide, and for other purposes.
